DOC.brief_title: Effects St. John 's Wort Oral Contraceptive Hormone Levonorgestrel
DOC.detailed_description: In last decade , St. John 's wort become one commonly used botanical . Levonorgestrel form progesterone , female hormone involve conception . It give pill injection use contraception treatment endometriosis . However , evidence suggest St. John 's wort may reduce effectiveness contraceptive hormone levonorgestrel . This study determine whether interaction St. John 's wort levonorgestrel reduce effectiveness hormone . This study also determine whether high dose levonorgestrel override effect St. John 's wort . All participant receive single dose levonorgestrel Days 9 12 first menstrual cycle enter study . Blood urine collection occur immediately levonorgestrel give every week participant ' next menstrual cycle determine level reproductive hormone participant ' body . At begin participant ' next menstrual cycle , randomly assign one four group receive either St. John 's wort placebo 6 week . Group 1 receive placebo ; Groups 2 3 receive standard dose St. John 's wort ( 900 mg per day ) ; Group 4 receive increase dose St. John 's wort ( 1500 mg per day ) . After 6 week , Groups 1 , 2 , 4 receive 150 mcg levonorgestrel ; Group 3 receive 225 mcg levonorgestrel . Blood urine collection occur immediately levonorgestrel give every week participant ' next menstrual cycle .
